meanings.sent1: The movie was unamusing and left everyone feeling bored.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was unamusing, with no jokes or funny stories to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent3: The unamusing situation made everyone groan instead of laugh.
meanings.sent4: The party was as unamusing as watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The unamusing play failed to capture the audience's attention.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes were unamusing and fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent2: The book turned out to be unamusing, with a predictable plot and no surprises.
meanings.sent3: The unamusing game show failed to engage the viewers.
meanings.sent4: The party was an unamusing affair, with no music or entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The unamusing speech left the audience yawning in their seats.
